name: Boxing Rescue Tonight ! Legends of Fisticuffs Ringlife's. Play Like a Champion
name_original: Boxing Rescue Tonight ! Legends of Fisticuffs Ringlife's. Play Like a Champion
description:
Army Base Boxing Championship is on , you have defeated many boxers , But this time its very hard mission. you can win this using real-time strategy . if you are real boxer then you should know how can you defeat opponent.

Boxing Rescue is a challenging game for real boxing lovers. If you are good in fighting love to fight so strong and brave to face the real enemies you are going to love this very addictive game. Real 3D Boxing Rescue Punch is constituent of perfectly tuned physics of great balancing 3D Boxer model.
Boxing Rescue Punch is a complete game it will surely make you addictive because of its huge amount of challenges.
Feel the real experience of boxing as you are in the boxing ring.

Game Features:
- Real 3D Boxing Punch consists of 3 rounds.
- Great Graphics great controls great levels and highly addictive game.
- Best graphics great crowd great music.

Best of luck

Very Simple control.
Army Base Championship
